about.title: About me
text: I am a 32-year-old male who is honest, disciplined, diligent, and skilled in developing Desktop Programs, Web Applications (E-Learning, E-Commerce, ERP), and Mobile Applications (Android, iOS). I have a solid understanding of ISO standards (9001:2015, 27001:2022) and excel at collaborating with others in a team environment.

I currently work as a DevOps Engineer, responsible for designing the technologies used to develop solutions such as Servers, RESTful APIs, Backends, and Frontends. My role extends beyond development to include optimization, ensuring that the programs I build deliver maximum performance.

services.title: DevOps Engineer
services.text: Developing and Monitoring RESTful APIs, Back-End, and Front-End.

services.title: Mobile apps
services.text: Developing mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms.

services.title: Design
services.text: Designing UI/UX using Adobe tools (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD) and Figma.

items.description: Here, I studied Computer Engineering and gained a wealth of knowledge that has been very beneficial.
Managing and maintaining computer networks, managing and maintaining servers, managing and maintaining web applications.

items.position: IT Manager, Doc. ISO 9001:2008, Support HRD
items.description:
Managing Information Technology and computer systems:
- Developing and implementing IT policies and procedures, including IT security policies.
- Designing, managing, monitoring, and evaluating the operation of information systems (software and applications) and their supporting infrastructure (hardware, telecommunications).
Implementing Zahir Flaxy Trade 6 and applying ISO 9001:2015.

- Creating a Website Using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL
- Implementing and Maintaining ISO 9001:2015

- Implementation and Monitoring of ISO 27001:2022.
- Creating and maintaining servers using Linux.
- Developing and maintaining RESTful APIs using PHP (Laravel), NodeJS (ExpressJS), MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL.
- Developing and maintaining back-end systems using PHP (Laravel), NodeJS (ReactJS + TypeScript), Axios, Apollo Client, GraphQL, tRPC.
- Developing and maintaining front-end systems using ReactJS, NextJS, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.
